entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Drizzle, 3.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Greater Moncton Roméo LeBlanc Int'l Airport 9:00 AM ADT Wednesday 3 May 2023

Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.7 kPa rising
Visibility: 2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.9°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2
